articles.title: I trusted highest courts, give back my right to live in peace: Bilkis Bano after Gujarat frees her tormentors
articles.description: The statement, issued by Bilkis' advocate Shobha Gupta late on Wednesday evening, says, "Two days ago, on August 15, 2022, the trauma of the past 20 years washed over me again."
articles.content: Two days after it allowed the release of the 11 lifers convicted of gang-raping her and killing her family members, a distraught Bilkis Bano has appealed to the Gujarat government to undo the harm an… [+2748 chars]

articles.title: "Will Withdraw Campaign In Bihar If...": Prashant Kishor
articles.description: Poll strategist-turned-politician Prashant Kishor on Wednesday asserted that if the newly formed 'Mahagathbandhan' government in Bihar provides five to 10 lakh jobs in the next one or two years, he would withdraw his 'Jan Suraj Abhiyan'.
articles.content:
The state will witness more political upheavals in the near future, Prashant Kishor said.
Samastipur, Bihar: Poll strategist-turned-politician Prashant Kishor on Wednesday asserted that if the newly… [+1854 chars]

articles.title: BJP Top Body: BS Yediyurappa In, Nitin Gadkari Out, No Yogi Adityanath
articles.description: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari and Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Shivraj Chouhan were dropped from the BJP's highest decision-making body today in an organisational shake-up that saw Devendra Fadnavis and BS Yediyurappa score after recent setbacks.
articles.content:
Nitin Gadkari's exclusion from the important committee is the biggest shocker in this exercise.

articles.title: After Puri’s Tweet, MHA Says No EWS Flats to Rohingyas; Refugees to be at Detention Centres till Deportatio
articles.description: Union Minister Hardeep Singh Puri had earlier lauded the Centre’s decision to shift Rohingya refugees to EWS flats. Puri also said that India has always welcomed those who have sought refuge in the country

articles.title: Delhi Sees 60% Increase In Hospitalisation For Covid In 14 Days
articles.description: Hospitalisations in Delhi are up by over 60 per cent as the city reports a surge in coronavirus cases with a positivity rate of 19.20 per cent, highest in over 200 days, data show. At least 90 per cent of those admitted have not taken booster shots.
articles.content:
Delhi has reported a positivity rate of 19.20 per cent, highest in over 200 days.
New Delhi: Hospitalisations in Delhi are up by over 60 per cent since August 1 as the city reports a surge in corona… [+2867 chars]

articles.title: Bihar: Asked to surrender in kidnapping case, Kartikeya Singh instead took oath as law minister | Exclusive
articles.description: A day after Chief Minister Nitish Kumar expanded his new cabinet on Tuesday by inducting 31 new ministers, including a huge contingent of 16 from key ally RJD, controversy has erupted over the induction of RJD MLC Kartikeya Singh as the law minister of the st…
articles.content:
• Controversy has erupted over induction of RJD MLC Kartikeya Singh
  • He has been divested of law ministry in the state
  • A case of kidnapping has been registered against Singh
